sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Industrial Biotech Partnership Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Industrial Biotech Partnership Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. Illinois will actively pursue expansion of the industrial biotechnology and biorenewables industry
sections.text: This growing field closely aligns with several key industries that the State is pursuing through the 2019 "Plan to Revitalize the Illinois Economy and Build the Workforce of the Future", such

sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Duties. The Partnership shall have the following duties:
sections.text: Duties. The Partnership shall have the following duties:

sections.heading: Funding. The Partnership may receive funding through specific appropriations available for its purposes made to the Department
sections.text: Moneys appropriated to the Department for the use of the Partnership as provided in this Act shall not be disbursed to the Partnership until the Partnership certifies to th

sections.heading: Reports. On or before January 31 of the next calendar year to occur after the last day of any State fiscal year in which the Partnership receives State funding, the Department shall submit to the General Assembly and the Governor a report describing the use of appropriated funds by the Partnership i
sections.text: Reports. On or before January 31 of the next calendar year to occur after the last day of any State fiscal year in which the Partnership receives State funding, the Department shall submit to the General Assembly and the Governor a report describing the use of appropriated funds by the Partnership in the State fiscal year for which the funds were allocated.

sections.heading: Rules. The Department shall adopt all rules necessary for the implementation of this Act.
sections.text: Rules. The Department shall adopt all rules necessary for the implementation of this Act.

sections.heading: Partnership dissolved.   The Partnership is dissolved on December 31, 2025.
sections.text: Partnership dissolved. The Partnership is dissolved on December 31, 2025.

sections.heading: Repeal.   This Act is repealed on January 1, 2027.
sections.text: Repeal. This Act is repealed on January 1, 2027.
